title: Serif Family of fonts
content:
Hi could somebody help me id this serif family?

Many Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091112224425im_/http:/typophile.com/files/serif_3515.jpg)
author: simundo

comments.content: Got it folks. “Clarendon” thought I had it somewhere. Thanks anyway.
You have probably seen also Sentinel from Hoefler & Frere-Jones, a new version, very legible and with a real italic version, I adore it.
The serif at the bottom is [Serifa Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20091112224425/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/serifa/light/characters.html).
